music for the deaf

24 Jan 2005

Greetings to any other Joe Wright's!

In other news I've had a think about the best bands ever and so far I have the following.

Everclear, Soulwax, The Beatles, Nirvana, Weezer, Oasis

Not generally based on having a massively succesful back catalogue, can be just based on one or two albums. Finding a band with a 100% track record is near impossible, (hence excusing Oasis's later efforts).

Joe Wright
